product_name: The North Face Freedom Shell Pants - Men's
long_description: The North Face Freedom shell pants for men supply waterproof protection and a relaxed fit for your days on the slopes, from deep powder days to spring slush runs. 2-layer HyVent(R) shell pants are waterproof, windproof and breathable; seams are sealed to prevent moisture from seeping through. Chimney Venting(TM) design uses StretchVent(TM) gaiters and zippered outer thigh vents with mesh gussets to let you control airflow and your comfort. Shell pants have a relaxed fit with articulated knees for excellent freedom of movement. Rip-and-stick tabs on waistband adjust the fit; zippered, snap-closure fly. Zippered handwarmer pockets; single, roomy cargo pocket. The North Face Freedom shell pants feature reinforced cuffs that resist abrasion from boots, boards and skis.
